Job Description: Description      Qwinix is looking for Software Developer Javascript        Primary Responsibilities:     Analyze, design and develop software based on user stories and requirements    Design and develop nontraditional web applications using JavaScript and HTML5 features    Develop new features, enhancements, and maintain software products and applications    Collaborate with related teams to create consistency within similar/related product suite    Design and develop prototypes for various concepts and applications    Make sure the applications comply to support W3C standards and can support multiple browsers    Employ best engineering practices for design and development    Work as part of a product-based development team to deliver a complete solution in a timely manner    Ability to effectively communicate with the development, QA and product management teams      Requirements    5 years of professional experience writing JavaScript    Expert knowledge level and skills using pure ES6, JavaScript, and jQuery    Expert knowledge level and skills in CSS3    Strong experience with HTML5, preferred experience using HTML5 JavaScript API    Understanding of how to write clean code that manages complexity    Strong written and verbal communication skills    Ability to write unit tests and ensure code and functional quality    Strong problem-solving skills, and creative thinking    Ability to work in a team environment, and collaborate    Bachelor of Science in Computer Science or equivalent experience       Helpful for Success:     Working knowledge of C# and ASP.Net    A passion for best software development best practices    Understanding of System on Chip (SoC) devices and hardware integrations    Understanding and/or familiarity of Digital Signage applications
